ABOUT ME

About Me

Hi, my name is Samson Tadesse and Im a Senior Computer Science Student with a minor in Data Science. I have a passion for full-stack development, machine learning, and crafting efficient algorithms that solve complex problems. My academic journey has been driven by a commitment to leverage technology to create innovative solutions, and Im currently seeking internship opportunities to apply and expand my skills in a real-world setting.
